text: James Anthony Davis Borikó (born 5 July 1995), simply known as James, is a Spanish-born Equatoguinean professional footballer who plays for Tercera División club Atlético Saguntino and the Equatorial Guinea national team. Mainly a winger, he can also appear as a left back. ==Club career== Born in Palma, Majorca, Balearic Islands, James joined RCD Mallorca's youth setup in 2011, aged 16, from CD Atlético Baleares.Penúltima sesión con bajas importantes (Penultimate session with significant losses) ; RCD Mallorca, 5 October 2012 He was also called up to train with the main squad two times, one in October 2012 under Joaquín Caparrós, and other in February 2013 under Gregorio Manzano.Tercera sesión semanal en Son Bibiloni (Third weekly session in Son Bibiloni) ; RCD Mallorca, 13 February 2013 In the 2014 summer James was promoted to the reserves in Segunda División B. He made his senior debut on 24 August, coming on as a second-half substitute in a 2–1 home win against Valencia CF Mestalla.Crónica 2ª División B: RCD Mallorca B 2–1 Valencia Mestalla (2ª División B feature: RCD Mallorca B 2–1 Valencia Mestalla); Fútbol Balear, 24 August 2014 James made his professional debut on 21 November 2015, coming on as a half-time substitute for Thierry Moutinho in a 1–1 home draw against CD Lugo for the Segunda División championship.El Lugo deja al 'Chapi' Ferrer en la cuerda floja (Lugo leaves 'Chapi' Ferrer under the strings); Marca, 21 November 2015 On 24 June of the following year, he signed a new two-year deal with the club, but remained assigned to the B-side.James renueva con el RCD Mallorca (James renews with RCD Mallorca); RCD Mallorca, 24 June 2016 On 22 August 2018, James was loaned to third division side CD Guijuelo, for one year.El Guijuelo recibe al cedido James Anthony Davis (Guijuelo receive the loanee James Anthony Davis); Salamanca 24 Horas, 22 August 2018 ==International career== A son of a Fernandino father and a Bubi mother, James was eligible for Equatorial Guinea despite being born in Spain. On 26 March 2015 he made his full international debut, starting in a 0–2 friendly loss against Egypt.Nzalang Nacional pierde ante Egipto (Nzalang Nacional loses against Egypt); Guinea Ecuatorial Press, 27 March 2015 ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" ! colspan=3 | Equatorial Guinea |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2015||2||0 |- |2016||1||0 |- !Total||3||0 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Citizens of Equatorial Guinea through descent Category:Equatoguinean footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Association football utility players Category:Equatorial Guinea international footballers Category:Segunda División B players Category:Tercera División players Category:Segunda División players Category:Football League (Greece) players Category:RCD Mallorca B players Category:RCD Mallorca players Category:CD Guijuelo footballers Category:Iraklis Thessaloniki F.C. players Category:Equatoguinean expatriate footballers Category:Equatoguinean expatriate sportspeople in Greece Category:Expatriate footballers in Greece Category:People of Bubi descent Category:People of Liberated African descent Category:Sportspeople from Palma de Mallorca Category:Footballers from Mallorca Category:Spanish footballers Category:Spanish expatriate footballers Category:Spanish expatriate sportspeople in Greece Category:Spanish people of Equatoguinean descent Category:Spanish people of Bubi descent
title: James Davis Borikó
